title: Fright
description:
Craig Conant, Susan Lieu, and Heather Minter share stories about a drug raid, a daughter's grief, and a frightening time on a Christian mission.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Polar Bear, Craig Conant, Lil Wayne, Heather Minter, Kevin Allison, Solange, Susan Lieu, Melody Gardot)
